content:
As of March 24 on March 24, one ship has brought out one ship in the Black Sea.

About thisreportedNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

There are no enemy ships in the Sea of Azov.

In the Mediterranean, one enemy ship is on duty - the carpet carrier "Caliber", a total volley of up to 8 rockets.

During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation the passage of the Kerch Strait was made:

  • 11 vessels to the Azov Sea, 5 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;
  • To the Black Sea - 19 ships, 3 of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.

The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (SOLAS), switching off automatic identification systems (AIS).

As reportedArmyinform, as of March 23, Russian warships did not go to the Black and Azov seas.
title: Russia brought one ship to the Black Sea - without "calibers"
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Sea of Azov enemy ships ...
author: Army Inform
